channel.title: How to remove Anti-leach sounds from CreativeScape!
channel.description:
Tutorial made very newb friendly.
Classes modified - -- SoundPlayer.java -- Client.java -- Signlink.java (optional)
What does this tutorial accomplish? The annoying weapon noises, clicking (to walk) noises, and other annoying sound affects will be silenced. All game music can be silenced using the options menu in game, but this disables SFX.
Part One: Disable start up jingle (optional, I didn't)
Open /sign/ signlink.java
Find: [code] public static boolean loginMusicOff = false; [/code] replace with: [code] public static boolean loginMusicOff = true; /** no Load up music*/ [/code] or just change false to true...
Save and Compile
Part Two: Step one: Disable game sound effects
open SoundPlayer.java
Comment out the whole file.
Save and close.
Spoiler for don't know how to do this properly? open spoiler:
find in the imports, will be the first one: [code] import java.io.InputStream; [/code] Above that, type: Code: [code]/** Fuck the Sounds![/code] and at the very bottom of the file, below all the }'s type: [code] */ Save and close[/code]
Part Two: Step Two:
Open Client.java
find: [code] new SoundPlayer((InputStream)new[/code] Replace with: [code] ///new SoundPlayer((InputStream)new[/code]
Below that find: [code] ByteArrayInputStream(stream.aByteArray1405, 0, stream.anInt1406));[/code] Replace that with: [code] //ByteArrayInputStream(stream.aByteArray1405, 0, stream.anInt1406));[/code] Save and compile, you're done.

item.title: How to remove Anti-leach sounds from CreativeScape!
item.dc:creator: @ComputerLove ComputerLove
item.description:
@ComputerLove wrote:

Team_Rocket:

This wasn’t made as an anti-leech. This should really be in Snippets by the way. I guess you did a good job?

Thx now i am tryin to remove anti-leach from commandmanager.java but it doesnt work lol r0cky ownz have put many leachs into creativescape…

Read full topic

item.title: How to remove Anti-leach sounds from CreativeScape!
item.dc:creator: @ComputerLove ComputerLove
item.description:
@ComputerLove wrote:

Tutorial made very newb friendly.

Classes modified -
– SoundPlayer.java
– Client.java
– Signlink.java (optional)

What does this tutorial accomplish?
The annoying weapon noises, clicking (to walk) noises, and other annoying sound affects will be silenced.
All game music can be silenced using the options menu in game, but this disables SFX.

Part One:
Disable start up jingle (optional, I didn’t)

Open /sign/ signlink.java

Find:

public static boolean loginMusicOff = false;
replace with:

public static boolean loginMusicOff = true; /** no Load up music*/
or just change false to true…

Save and Compile

Part Two: Step one:
Disable game sound effects

open SoundPlayer.java

Comment out the whole file.

Save and close.

Spoiler for don’t know how to do this properly? open spoiler:

find in the imports, will be the first one:

import java.io.InputStream;
Above that, type:
Code:

and at the very bottom of the file, below all the }'s type:

*/ Save and close

Part Two: Step Two:

Open Client.java

find:

new SoundPlayer((InputStream)new
Replace with:

///new SoundPlayer((InputStream)new

Below that find:

ByteArrayInputStream(stream.aByteArray1405, 0, stream.anInt1406));
Replace that with:

//ByteArrayInputStream(stream.aByteArray1405, 0, stream.anInt1406));
Save and compile, you’re done.

Read full topic
